system.availability: Arm/Wrist Mounted, has three auto-injectors and a saw for cutting through armour. Provides all benefits of Good-Craftsmanship Medikit, user can administer a dose of drugs from one of the injectors as a Free Action. Each injector can store a different drug. Saw can be used in melee: Profile (1d10+1 R, Pen 2, Tearing, Unwieldy).
system.cost:
